mapper.insert: insert into l_manual_order(ord_no, category, carrier_no, track_no, owner, status, update_on, create_on, create_by, update_by, from_ken_id, from_city_id, from_town_id, from_where, from_zipcode, to_ken_id, to_city_id, to_town_id, to_where, to_zipcode, on_behalf, amount, china_no, from_contact, to_contact, from_whom, to_whom, channel) values (#{orderNo}, #{category}, #{orderNo}, #{trackNo}, #{creator}, #{status}, #{updateOn}, #{createOn}, #{creator}, #{updator}, #{fromKenId}, #{fromCityId}, #{fromTownId}, #{fromDetailAddress}, #{fromZipCode}, #{toKenId}, #{toCityId}, #{toTownId}, #{toDetailAddress}, #{toZipCode}, #{collect}, #{orderNo}, #{chinaNo}, #{fromContact}, #{toContact}, #{fromName}, #{toName}, #{channel})
insert into l_manual_order_content(ordno, sku, name, num, price) values (#{saleRecNo}, #{sku}, #{name}, #{num}, #{price})
